Sentencas: Perovskites of the system Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-delta have been investigated in terms of their applicability in high temperature electrochemical devices.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Thereby the stability, thermal expansion and conductivity properties in different oxygen partial pressures have been examined.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Pr0.5Sr0.5MnO3-delta shows a p-type conductivity of 135 S/cm at 700 degrees C and in a partial pressure range from p(O-2)=20 kPa (air) to P(O-2)=2.10(-3) kPa (argon) which slightly decreases to 105 S/cm at p(O-2)=10(-14) kPa.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion does not vary between air and argon and is close to values of state of the art electrolytes.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Therefore Pr0.5Sr0.5MnO3-delta is a promising candidate for the application as the cathode material in a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Partial substitution of praseodymium by strontium increases the amount of oxygen vacancies and therefore increases the ionic conductivity when no multivalent B-site cation is involved.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: A solubility limit of x=0.2...0.3 exists for Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-delta (y=0.5; 1) perovskites.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Exceeding this limit leads to the formation of a secondary phase which is identified as SrIn2O4.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of Pr0.5Sr0.5InO3-delta reaches 3.10(-3) S/cm from air to p (O-2)=4.10(-16) kPa at 700 degrees C. Due to the incorporation of the insulating secondary phase SrIn2O4 the real ionic conductivity of the phase pure perovskite is expected to be higher.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites

Sentencas: Therefore this material is promising for the application in high temperature electrochemical devices when oxygen ionic conductivity is required.
Titulo: Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites
Non-stoichiometry, thermal expansion and electrical properties of Pr1-xSrxMn1-yInyO3-δ perovskites
